Detailed Description

Exception raised by the object of the OMiSCID system library.

This class is a mother class for exceptions. All derived classes must define their own exception type (const char*) by rewriting the virtual function GetExceptionType.
Inherited by SocketException raised by Socket objects and SimpleListException raised by SimpleList object.

Author:
Domnique Vaufreydaz

Sebastien Pesnel

Member Function Documentation

SimpleString SimpleException::GetExceptionType (  )  const [virtual]

The virtual function to return the exception type.

Returns:
A const char * pointer to a human readable exception type, usualy the class name.
All classes derived from SimpleException must described themselves by implementing this fonction.

Reimplemented in Omiscid::SimpleListException, Omiscid::SocketException, Omiscid::MsgSocketException, Omiscid::ServicePropertiesException, and Omiscid::ServiceException.
